data.question: What is the empirical formula for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What is the space group of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
At what temperature (K) was the single crystal X-ray diffraction data for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent collected?
What is the unit cell length (a) for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
How many formula units (Z) are there in the unit cell of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What is the calculated density (ρcalc) of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent in Mg/m3?
What is the final R1 index value for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent after refinement?
Is the MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent structure cubic?
Does the MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent structure have a primitive centering?
What is the absorption coefficient (μ) for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What is the goodness-of-fit on F2 for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
Are all double-8-rings (d8rs) in MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 occupied by the MeMeCH2 template?
data.answer: No, only half of the d8rs are occupied.

data.question: What is the estimated number of DMF molecules in the crystal structure of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent per formula unit?
Does the presence of an acidic hydrogen in the 2 position of the imidazolate ligand crucial for templation using the cavitand?
What happens when 2-methylimidazole is used instead of imidazole in the synthesis?
data.answer: The RHO topology product is not formed, and instead, the SOD-ZnIm2 (ZIF-8) material is obtained.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of 0.90MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 made by the LAG DEF procedure?
Is the MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 structure stable in air for months?
What is the theoretical pore volume percentage reached by the new xMeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 material?
Does the flexibility of the RHO framework affect its sorption properties?
What is the effect of longer milling time on the product obtained in the LAG procedure?
data.answer: Longer milling time can result in unwanted products, such as nog-ZnIm2.
